sentence.Network_en: Hopefully, you won't have any problems after reading this.
sentence.Network_cn: 希望你读完这个后就不会有任何问题了。

sentence.Network_en: "Am I welcome?" He smiled hopefully, leaning on the door.
sentence.Network_cn: “欢迎我吗？”他靠在门上，满怀希望地笑着说道。

sentence.Network_en: Hopefully she'llunderstand and forgive you, if she really loves you.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果她真的爱你的话，希望她会理解并原谅你。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 练习口语的经典句式，词组_百度知道 ... Gorgeous!- 美极了！ Hopefully!- 希望如此！ Horrible!- 好可怕！.
Mary and Max 《玛丽和马克思》全部台词 ... crack: 裂缝 hopefully: [口语]但愿 survey: 调查.
人教版高中英语单词表(第二册下必修) - 豆丁网 ... tourist n. 旅行者；观光者 hopefully adv. 有希望地 wheelchair n. 轮椅.
hope you - 英汉词典 ... I hope you're right.( 但愿是这样。) Hopefully.( 但愿能去。) I'll keep my hopes up.( 我期待着……。).

list.abs: obviously , that will take bit of time but hopefully it can be fast tracked so we can supply the demand which will be integral to the longer term sustainability of the industry in Wales .显然，这会需要一些时间，但我们希望交易能够很快达成，然后，我们就可以向中国提供羊肉。这对威尔士肉类行业的长期可持续性是至关重要的。
We need to show some fight and hopefully Rodriguez will enjoy a debut to remember ., 我们需要展现出斗志 , 希望罗德里格斯的处子秀能够让我们铭记.
I'll an IV line and start the medication for you . hopefully , your headache will get better .我会为你插入静脉注射的管子，然后开始药物治疗。但愿你的头痛会好一些。
" See anything ? " called Aaron hopefully .亚伦怀着希望说：“看到什么了？”

entry.tran: 但愿，作为希望（一些用词严谨者认为这种用法不正确，但实际上已被频繁地使用）
entry.def: You say hopefully when mentioning something that you hope will happen. Some careful speakers of English think that this use of hopefully is not correct, but it is very frequently used.

example.ex: Both of them have been through an awful lot and hopefully now I can help them rebuild their lives...
example.tran: 他们两人都曾历经磨难，但愿现在我能帮助他们重建正常的生活。

example.ex: Hopefully, you won't have any problems after reading this.
example.tran: 希望你读完这个后就不会有任何问题了。

means.word_mean: 1. with hope; in a hopeful manner;

sentences.sentence: "we searched hopefully for a good position"
"hopefully the weather will be fine on Sunday"

Sentence.sentence: At least, you are making use of your money, and hopefully deriving value and pleasure from it.

means.word_mean: 怀有希望地;如果顺利的话,可望

sentences.en: The campaign will hopefully ensure the survival of the tiger.
sentences.cn: 这场运动有望确保老虎的生存。

sentences.en: The hungry dog looked hopefully at the food.
sentences.cn: 那只饿狗望着食物,满怀希望。

sentences.en: Hopefully the tree will produce some blossom next year.
sentences.cn: 这棵树有望在明年开花。
